Blocksford Brickopore Sequencer
===============================

.. toctree::
   :hidden:
   
   tutorial

Blocksford Brickopore present their exciting Danish brick based sequencing technology. 

For a tutorial on running the sequencer, see the :ref:`tutorial page <tutorial>`.

Follow us
=========
You can follow NanoOK updates on twitter `@brickopore <https://twitter.com/brickopore>`_.
